author: James Martin
method: Heat the oil in a deep heavy-bottomed saucepan, until very hot or until a breadcrumb sizzles in it (CAUTION: Hot oil is very dangerous. Do not leave unattended). Mix the cinnamon and sugar together in a bowl. Carefully lower the tortilla ribbons into the hot oil and deep-fry until crisp and golden. Carefully remove with a slotted spoon and drain on kitchen paper. Sprinkle with the cinnamon sugar while still hot. Serve piled up in a bowl with a spoon of yoghurt on top
ingredients: 300ml/10fl oz vegetable oil for deep frying,  1 tsp cinnamon,  2 tsp caster sugar,  2 ready-made flour tortillas, cut into 1cm/Â½in strips,  1 tbsp Greek yoghurt, to serve (optional)
